action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A large building with a green dome and a statue on top. The building is made of stone and has many windows. There is a tall building to the left of the building with the dome. There are cars and buses in front of the building. There are trees on the left side of the image.

DESCRIPTION: A baseball player in a red and white uniform is swinging a bat. He is wearing a red helmet and is in a crouched position. The batter is facing the right side of the image. There is a catcher in a black uniform and a red helmet behind him. The catcher is reaching for a ball that is in the air. There is a green fence in the background and a crowd of people in the stands. There is a white line on the ground in front of the batter. The ground is brown and there is a white line on the ground in front of the catcher.
